Description: This guitar is absolutely gorgeous and has barely been played and looks like new. The case has four latches instead of three latches. This is the original case that came with the guitar. No fret wear.Normal light scratch marks on the pickguard area,Other than that it is like new.Check my feedback 100% and see what the buyers said about the guitars they purchased.You will not be disappointed,I PROMISE*** Check it Out, This will be posted locally also, so grab it before someone else does This is one you don't want to pass up.The only one posted on ebay with TREMELO & LOCKING TUNERS.I"m Retiring after 35 yrs as a professional musician.This is one of many great guitars that I bought for my collection.This beauty has just got a full tuneup. Polished frets / Intonation Setup FRET BOARD conditioned and new strings with 10's & is ready to make some great sounding music right out of the case. It is Single Cut and made of Ash.Les Paul Style, The Tremelo Bridge on this model is fronted with two Alnico pickups (also made by Taylor). Bolted neck is made of Maple and it is topped with a 22-fret Rosewood Fingerboard.The Tremelo is one of the best I have ever used & easy to install with a unique self locking system.Stays in tune great. Bridge Taylor's tremolo bridge on the SB-T guitar features a modern design that will feel comfortable and familiar to whammy bar fans. It has a lowered fulcrum point that creates a more fluid, balanced feel. This tremolo has a flexible design that lets you set it up to float (pull up and push down) or bottom out (push down only). Locking tuners ensure that tuning stability is maintained.Taylor's contoured bridge gives it a curvy, ultra-smooth feel. This all-aluminum bridge solves the intonation drift and ergonomic problems that often plague other electric bridges. The bridge height can be adjusted both front-to-back and side-to-side. Each of the strings sits in its own saddle, and once the intonation is set, the saddles are locked in place with screws located discretely under the bridge (accessible from the back). Once everything is locked down, you can take the strings off without the saddles moving, maintaining precise intonation. FEATURESModel Name: SolidBody with tremoloBody: swamp ashFinish: UV polyColor 2 Tone BurstNeck: mapleNeck joint: T-lockFretboard: rosewood, 15" radiusNo. of frets: 22Thank you for your interest,Any ?"s let me know
Title: Taylor SB-T Classic Electric Guitar/Tremelo/Locking Tuners
